comment: Vaccine lagwa lo kaagaz pattar k chakkar mai na pado
amr:
# ::snt Vaccine lagwa lo kaagaz pattar k chakkar mai na pado
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / laugh-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Vaccine"
                        :op2 "Lagwa"))
            :ARG1 (p2 / pattar)
            :mod (l2 / lo))
      :snt2 (c / chakkar
            :mode expressive)
      :snt3 (p3 / pado))

comment: Pehle Ganaga mein apni Maa-Bahan ki Lashein gin lo, phir paper dekh lena
amr:
# ::snt Pehle Ganaga mein apni Maa-Bahan ki Lashein gin lo, phir paper dekh lena
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / mein-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Pehle"
                        :op2 "Ganzaga"))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Maa-Bahan"
                        :op2 "Kai"
                        :op3 "Lashein"
                        :op4 "Gin"
                        :op5 "Lena")))
      :snt2 (l / lo
            :mod (g / gin))
      :snt3 (p3 / paper
            :mod (p4 / phir)
            :mod (d / dekh
                  :mode expressive)))

comment: Paper toh hai but Pakistan ka.Tabhi apne desh ke baare mein soch ke INDIA ki itni burai karti hai
amr:
# ::snt Paper toh hai but Pakistan ka.Tabhi apne desh ke baare mein soch ke INDIA ki itni burai karti hai
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (p / paper
                  :mod (t / toh))
            :ARG2 (c2 / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Pakistan")
                  :mod (t2 / toh)))
      :snt2 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (w / work-of-art
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Tabhi"))
            :ARG2 (w2 / work-of-art
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Pakistan")
                  :mod (t3 / toh))))

comment: Dekhna behen block to nhi maar diya isne
amr:
# ::snt Dekhna behen block to nhi maar diya isne
(a / and
      :op1 (b / block-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you))
      :op2 (s / say-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 y
            :op3-of a)
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 y
      :ARG1 (m / maar
            :mode expressive)
      :ARG2 y)
